line1: Believe in yourself and all that you are.
Believe in yourself and all that you are.
line2: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow is our doubts of today.
line3: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
line4: Hardships often prepare ordinary people for an extraordinary destiny.
line5: The harder you work for something, the greater you’ll feel when you achieve it.
line6: Don’t watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
line7: Success is not how high you have climbed, but how you make a positive difference to the world.
line8: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
line10: Push yourself, because no one else is going to do it for you.
line11: Great things never come from comfort zones.
line12: Dream it. Wish it. Do it.
line13: The best way to predict the future is to create it.
line14: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
line15: Do something today that your future self will thank you for.
line17: It’s going to be hard, but hard does not mean impossible.
line18: Don’t stop when you’re tired. Stop when you’re done.
line19: Wake up with determination. Go to bed with satisfaction.
line20: The key to success is to focus on goals, not obstacles.
line21: Be the change that you wish to see in the world.
line22: It always seems impossible until it’s done.
line23: Dream big and dare to fail.
line24: Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.
line25: You don’t have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great.
line26: Everything you’ve ever wanted is on the other side of fear.
line27: Start where you are. Use what you have. Do what you can.
line28: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.
line29: Do what you can with all you have, wherever you are.
line30: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
line31: Failure is another stepping stone to greatness.
line32: What you get by achieving your goals is not as important as what you become by achieving your goals.
line33: You don’t have to control your thoughts. You just have to stop letting them control you.
line34: Setting goals is the first step in turning the invisible into the visible.
line35: When you have a dream, you’ve got to grab it and never let go.
line36: Never bend your head. Always hold it high. Look the world straight in the eye.
line37: The man who has confidence in himself gains the confidence of others.
line38: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
line39: Don’t let yesterday take up too much of today.
line40: We generate fears while we sit. We overcome them by action.
line41: सपने वो नहीं जो हम सोते वक्त देखते हैं, सपने वो हैं जो हमें सोने नहीं देते।
line42: कोशिश करने वालों की कभी हार नहीं होती।
line43: अपनी मेहनत से ही हम अपनी तक़दीर बदल सकते हैं।
line44: जो वक़्त तुम्हें मजबूर कर रहा है, वही तुम्हें ताक़त भी देगा।
line45: सपने वो नहीं जो हम सोते वक्त देखते हैं, सपने वो होते हैं जो हमें सोने नहीं देते।
line46: जहाँ चाह है, वहाँ राह है।
line47: जो लोग अपने सपनों के पीछे भागते हैं, वे एक दिन अपने सपनों से भी बड़े बन जाते हैं।
line48: वो हमेशा हारता है जो कोशिश करना छोड़ देता है।
line49: आप कभी भी हार नहीं सकते, जब तक आप हार मानने का निर्णय नहीं लेते।
line50: जो असफलता से डरते हैं, वे सफलता की खुशी नहीं समझ सकते।
line51: अपने सपनों को सच करने के लिए हमें अपने डर से ज्यादा अपने आत्मविश्वास पर भरोसा करना चाहिए।
line52: जिसे आप पाना चाहते हैं, उसे पाने के लिए मेहनत करनी होगी।
line53: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
line54: The only way to achieve the impossible is to believe it is possible.
line55: Dream big, work hard, stay focused.
line56: Success is the sum of small efforts repeated day in and day out.
line57: You don't have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great.
line58: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
line59: The harder you work for something, the greater you'll feel when you achieve it.
line60: Everything you can imagine is real.
line61: Opportunities don't happen, you create them.
line62: Don't wait for the perfect moment, take the moment and make it perfect.
line63: Don’t watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
line64: Failure is the condiment that gives success its flavor.
line65: Success doesn’t come from what you do occasionally, it comes from what you do consistently.
line66: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow is our doubts of today.
line67: What you get by achieving your goals is not as important as what you become by achieving your goals.
line68: The secret to getting ahead is getting started.
line69: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
line70: Success is not how high you have climbed, but how you make a positive difference to the world.
line71: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
line72: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
line73: If you can dream it, you can do it.
line74: The best way to predict the future is to create it.
line75: Don't be afraid to give up the good to go for the great.
line76: In the middle of difficulty lies opportunity.
line77: Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
line78: Happiness is not something ready-made. It comes from your own actions.
line79: The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be.
line80: If you don't build your dream, someone else will hire you to help them build theirs.
line81: Doubt kills more dreams than failure ever will.
line82: The harder you work, the luckier you get.
line83: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success.
line84: Do not wait to strike till the iron is hot, but make it hot by striking.
line85: The best revenge is massive success.
line86: Don’t be pushed around by the fears in your mind. Be led by the dreams in your heart.
line87: It always seems impossible until it's done.
line88: You have to be odd to be number one.
line89: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.
line90: The difference between who you are and who you want to be is what you do.
line91: Success is not measured by what you accomplish, but by the opposition you have encountered and the courage with which you have maintained the struggle against overwhelming odds.
line92: The key to success is to focus on goals, not obstacles.
line93: Great things never come from comfort zones.
line94: Success is not in what you have, but who you are.
line95: The road to success is always under construction.
line96: Do not go where the path may lead, go instead where there is no path and leave a trail.
line97: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
line98: Success is the result of preparation, hard work, and learning from failure.
line99: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
line100: Success is how you bounce back when you hit rock bottom.
line101: Hard work beats talent when talent doesn't work hard.
line103: Dream big and dare to fail.
line104: Challenges are what make life interesting.
line105: Success is the sum of small efforts repeated day in and day out.
line106: Believe in yourself and all that you are.
line107: What you do today can improve all your tomorrows.
line108: The best way to predict the future is to create it.
line109: Failure is the opportunity to begin again more intelligently.
line110: Courage is resistance to fear, mastery of fear, not absence of fear.
line111: Do what you can with all you have, wherever you are.
line112: The harder the battle, the sweeter the victory.
line113: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
line114: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.
line115: You don’t have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great.
line116: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
line117: The road to success is always under construction.
line118: The secret of success is to do the common thing uncommonly well.
line119: Success is not in what you have, but who you are.
line120: Action is the foundational key to all success.
line121: Opportunities don't happen, you create them.
line122: Don’t wait for the perfect moment, take the moment and make it perfect.
line123: Small daily improvements are the key to staggering long-term results.
line124: Never give up on a dream just because of the time it will take to accomplish it.
line125: Great things never came from comfort zones.
line126: Don’t stop when you’re tired, stop when you’re done.
line127: Discipline is the bridge between goals and accomplishment.
line128: Success is not final; failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
line130: Hustle until your haters ask if you’re hiring.
line131: Every accomplishment starts with the decision to try.
line132: Your life does not get better by chance; it gets better by change.
line134: What seems impossible today will one day become your warm-up.
line135: Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
line136: Do one thing every day that scares you.
line137: If it doesn’t challenge you, it doesn’t change you.
line138: Focus on the step in front of you, not the whole staircase.
line139: Dreams don’t work unless you do.
line140: Start where you are, use what you have, do what you can.
line141: Don’t let the fear of losing be greater than the excitement of winning.
line142: Happiness is not by chance, but by choice.
line143: Fall seven times, stand up eight.
line144: The best revenge is massive success.
line145: Learn from yesterday, live for today, hope for tomorrow.
line146: With the new day comes new strength and new thoughts.
line147: Success is achieved and maintained by those who try and keep trying.
line148: Keep your face always toward the sunshine—and shadows will fall behind you.
line149: Success isn’t about how much money you make; it’s about the difference you make in people’s lives.
line150: A winner is a dreamer who never gives up.
line151: When you focus on possibilities, you’ll have more opportunities.
line152: Don’t downgrade your dream just to fit your reality.
line153: The journey of a thousand miles begins with one step.
line154: You can if you think you can.
line156: It’s not whether you get knocked down, it’s whether you get up.
line157: Be so good they can’t ignore you.
line158: You are stronger than you think.
line159: The key to success is to start before you are ready.
line160: Stay positive, work hard, make it happen.
line161: सपने वह नहीं जो हम सोते समय देखते हैं, सपने वह हैं जो हमें सोने नहीं देते।
line162: कड़ी मेहनत का कोई विकल्प नहीं है।
line163: आपकी सोच ही आपकी सीमा है।
line164: हर प्रयास आपको सफलता के करीब ले जाता है।
line165: खुद पर विश्वास करना सबसे बड़ी शक्ति है।
line166: सफलता का रहस्य है खुद पर यकीन।
line167: बड़ा सोचो और बड़े सपने देखो।
line168: हार मत मानो, एक नई शुरुआत करो।
line169: अवसर मिलते नहीं, बनाए जाते हैं।
line170: हर सुबह एक नया अवसर लेकर आती है।
line171: खुद को पहचानो, सफलता पास आएगी।
line172: दृढ़ संकल्प ही सफलता की चाबी है।
line174: आपके विचार आपकी असली ताकत हैं।
line175: खुद को चुनौती दें, सफलता आपका इंतजार कर रही है।
line176: जो जोखिम नहीं उठाते, वे कुछ नहीं पाते।
line177: हर असफलता सफलता की दिशा में एक कदम है।
line178: समस्या के समाधान पर ध्यान दें, शिकायत पर नहीं।
line179: सफलता का रास्ता कड़ी मेहनत से होकर जाता है।
line180: खुद को बेहतर बनाने की कोशिश करें।
line181: हर दिन एक नई शुरुआत है।
line182: अपने सपनों को साकार करने के लिए मेहनत करें।
line183: जो बदलता है वही आगे बढ़ता है।
line184: धैर्य और मेहनत से सफलता पाई जाती है।
line185: आपका समय सीमित है, इसे व्यर्थ मत करें।
line186: दूसरों से प्रेरणा लें, पर खुद की पहचान बनाएं।
line187: हार से सीखें और आगे बढ़ें।
line188: आपकी सफलता आपकी सोच पर निर्भर करती है।
line189: कड़ी मेहनत और लगन से सब कुछ संभव है।
line190: खुद पर विश्वास करना सफलता की शुरुआत है।
line191: आप जो करते हैं, उसी से आपकी पहचान बनती है।
line193: सपनों को साकार करने का समय आज है।
line195: जोश और लगन से सब कुछ संभव है।
line196: आपके फैसले आपकी सफलता का निर्माण करते हैं।
line197: सफलता वही पाता है जो कभी हार नहीं मानता।
line198: हर दिन का उपयोग बेहतर बनाने में करें।
line199: सफलता का रास्ता धैर्य और मेहनत से गुजरता है।
line200: खुद को बेहतर बनाने के लिए प्रयासरत रहें।
